colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (ZHES DPAL LDAN LHA MO 'DOD KHAMS DBANG PHYUG MA'I THUGS DAM BSKANGS PA DANG, 'GAL RKYEN GYI 'TSUB LHONG SOGS ZHI BA LA MCHOG TU BSNGAGS PA, SROG CHAGS RGYU SKONGS DANG, BAm SKONGS KYI CHO GA NYES PA KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SPYIR YANG SNYIGS MAR SPYOD PA'I DBANG GIS MA MO MKHA' 'GRO 'KHRUGS PA'I 'TSUB LTONGS KYIS BSKYED PA'I NAD GDON SHIN TU MANG PA DANG, LHAG PAR LO SPA PHYIR NYE SKOR DU NAD RIMS RIGS MI 'DRA BA MANG DU 'CHED CING, @008A *, ,MI SHIS PA'I BLTAS MTSAN SNA TSOGS BYUNG BA, BSRUNG MA'I 'KHU SDIG GI RNAM PA YIN PA DANG, BSKONGS BSHAGS MANG DU BTANG NA LEGS PA'I MTSAN MA KUN RTOGS KYI RI MOR SHAR BA BZHIN, LAG LEN DU BSTAR SKABS, ^BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA BAm SKONGS KYI CHO GA LHO BRAG GRUB CHEN LAS KYI RDO RJE'I GSUNG LA TSIGS PHRANG CUNG ZAD BSGYUR CIG , , ,LAG LEN GSAL BAR BGYIS TE, DBEN GNAS BDE CHEN CHOS GLING DU GLAG CHOG CHU 'BABS SU BKOD PA 'DIS KYANG MI MTHUN NYER 'TSE THAMS CAD ZHI ZHING, 'DOD KHAMS DBANG MO DGYES PAS 'PHRIN LAS RNAM BZHI LHUN GYIS GRUB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,'DI GNYAN PAS, GAR THOD DU BYA MI RUNG GSUNG PAS SNOD MIN LA GSANG SHING SKABS SHES PAR BYA'O, ,)
